017package com.fns.grivet.service;
018
019import org.json.JSONObject;
020import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
021import org.springframework.cloud.stream.function.StreamBridge;
022import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
023import org.springframework.messaging.Message;
024import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
025import org.springframework.util.Assert;
026import com.fns.grivet.model.Op;
027
028@Profile("pipeline")
029@Service
030public class IngestService implements Ingester {
031    @SuppressWarnings("all")
032    private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(IngestService.class);
033    public static final String DESTINATION = "message-out-0";
034    private final StreamBridge bridge;
035
036    @Autowired
037    public IngestService(StreamBridge bridge) {
038        this.bridge = bridge;
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void ingest(Message<JSONObject> message) {
043        Assert.notNull(message.getHeaders(), "No message headers!");
044        Assert.notNull(message.getHeaders().get("op", String.class), "Op code must be specified!");
045        if (message.getHeaders().get("op").equals(Op.CREATE.name())) {
046            Assert.hasText(message.getHeaders().get("type", String.class), "Type must not be null or empty!");
047        }
048        log.debug("Received message.  Headers - {}.  Payload - {}", message.getHeaders().toString(), message.getPayload().toString());
049        bridge.send(DESTINATION, message);
050    }
051}
